response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with this opportunity, I propose a purchase price of $12,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value while still ensuring a fair return for us. We appreciate your consideration and look forward to potentially serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 12500}
